means: 对某物（尤指机动交通工具）起推动作用的，推进的，有推进力的

sentence.Network_en: Venture capital is the propulsive force of the high technology industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 风险投资是高新技术产业发展的原动力.

sentence.Network_en: The faster a jet plane goes the greater its propulsive efficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 喷气式飞机的速度越快,它们的推进效率就越高.

sentence.Network_en: The jet plane has a greater propulsive power than the engine - driven plane.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机有更大的推进功率比的发动机驱动的飞机.
